chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:
The iPhone has more damage than expected - rather good condition
Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

Please ask the customer to check which device he returned. The IMEI can be found by keying in *#06# into the number pad.

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

As soon as you receive the customer's parcel, please initiate the refund process 

Regards,
Ermelinda from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this and we will await for the arrival of the parcel. In the meantime, can you double check with the customer whether he chose to send 1 out of the 2 phones he bought, for a refund and not both? Also, can you check with the customer which device's IMEI did he choose to return so that we can smoothly proceed with his device once it arrives. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hi ecomobile,

the customer just sent 1 device for refund. 

Please proceed with the refund.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Diogo Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this and are awaiting for the arrival of the parcel. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear Backcare,

We suppose to collect 2 phones. However, we collected 1 phone with IMEI:353742334270626 from our side. Can you confirm with the customer if he only wants to return 1 phone? Thank you.

Regards,
KW

Hi ecomobile,

Yes, the customer just wants to return 1 phone. 

Please proceed with the refund.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Diogo Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this, we will proceed with the necessary actions soon. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their refund.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Please proceed with the refund within 24h, otherwise we will do it. 

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Diogo Back Market customer Care

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Produkt ist durch Code/Muster gesperrt.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The phone is locked with a code. Kindly assist the customer in unlocking their device. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

client have not put the device into operation. In other words, he have neither entered a password nor made any other settings - as he have NOT put it into operation.
Therefore, he cannot provide any information about a password as he did not set one.
The device was not in good condition visually - so it was ruled out immediately.
you are  welcome to call the client  and he can clarify this with you.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Ricardo-Filipe Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
KW
